jedi:matchstick.NAME: Matchstick
jedi:matchstick.FLAVOR: The match is struck. A blazing star is born!

jedi:hotpepper.NAME: Hot Pepper
jedi:hotpepper.FLAVOR: Not only it burns your mouth when you eat it, it also leaves a horrible aftertaste so that any food after it doesn't taste well.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, #rreduce your Max HP by #r35%. Further Max HP changes are #rreduced #rby #r50%

jedi:laserpointer.NAME: Laser Pointer
jedi:laserpointer.FLAVOR: Why is it a pointer if it targets everyone?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yLock-On to ALL enemies.

jedi:fakemustache.NAME: Fake Mustache
DESCRIPTIONS: When spending #yGold at the shop, heal #b5 HP.

jedi:endoplasm.NAME: Endoplasm
jedi:endoplasm.FLAVOR: What do you mean it's just a better version of something already existing?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you lose HP, lose #r50 #yGold.

jedi:superconductor.NAME: Superconductor
jedi:superconductor.FLAVOR: You can almost hear orbs going round and round...
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b10 Orbs Channeled, trigger passive effect of ALL orbs.
